description:
This course is the #1 digital marketing course for beginners

Do you want to learn how to market your business?

Why not learn the actual digital strategies that marketing agencies are using?

Setting up your business marketing within 30 days is an all-encompassing guide to digital marketing.

This course is for any business owner who is new to digital marketing.

It covers:

  • How to create a strong brand identity
  • How to build a high converting website (without needing any coding knowledge)
  • How to optimise your website to help get found in Google
  • What gated content is and how to use it to build an email list
  • How to use social media to market your business
  • How to convert email subscribers to real paying customers

The course includes over 1 hour of content, however it will take you 30 days to complete (of 30 minutes per day) once you incorporate the implementation.

Take this course if you would like to fast track your marketing set up and get the direction to do it properly the first time.
title: Setting Up Your Business Marketing Within 30 Days
